summary:
Engineering professional with diverse experience in Industrial Automation, Project Management and Business Development. 

Hobby photographer and electronics enthusiast.

projects.title: PLC Input / Output module testing Jig - System design and developement
projects.description:
- Activities: Reverse engineering of L&T-Demag Injection molding controller Input / Output modules, Studying and generating CPU memory map for communication pin structure, Hardware system design of Module Testing Jig
- Platforms and Methods: Atmel AVR, Test hardware fabrication, Modular design

projects.title: Platform Development for FPGA Prototyping System
projects.description:
- Selection of an appropriate FPGA system architecture
- Design and development of PCB for proposed FPGA system using computer aid design tools, as per industrial guidelines and standards
- Develop sample applications for FPGA prototyping platform

projects.title: Iron Removal, Water Treatment and Recovery Solutions - Almarai
projects.description:
- Description: WETICO has been a long term total water solutions vendor for all mega dairy and poultry farms of Almarai. Water requirements range from treating deep-well water with moderate TDS to removing Iron and providing constant cooled water. WTP Refurbishment projects ensure older farms to keep capacity and high quality of output water. Total water production capacity (at distributed locations): 70,000 m3/day. 

Activities and Responsibilities: Involved in all stages of Plant EPC in Electrical and Automation domain, Plant control system Designing - Integration - Commissioning - Dedicated Customer Service

- Technologies: Siemens TIA Portal V12, Siemens S7-300, S7-1200, E+H instrumentation, GF-Signet 9100 based sensors/monitors, Prominent Dulcodes UV, Prominent analytical instrumentation, Schneider Altivar 61 VSD, Siemens VSD, Profibus I/O, WinCC SCADA

- Water Process: Saturation tank, Sand Filter, Carbon Filter, Cooling Tower, Ultra Filtration, CO2 treatment, UV sterilization, BWRO, Reject RO, Re-Mineralization, ClO2 treatment, RO Membrane Regeneration System, Chemical Dosing and Other associated systems

contributors.headline: Head of Aktau Office at Witteveen+Bos
Senior Project Engineer at Veolia Water Technologies |Project Management|Water|Waste Water|Installed Base Services|Techno Products|Sales Support-Bidding Tendering|Technical

projects.title: STP Plants for Najran and Jizan City - Ministry of Housing, Saudi Arabia
projects.description:
- Description: Domestic STP plants using MBR process. WETICO was awarded contract for complete plant EPC at multiple cities.

 - Activities and Responsibilities: Lead Electrical, Instrumentation and Control Engineer - client submittal approvals, detailed electrical design, panel fabrication, materials procurement, multi-vendor sub systems integration and design supervision, SCADA development. 

- Water Process: Lifting stations, Aerators and Axionic Mixers, Membrane Biological Reactors (MBR), Sludge dewatering and handling, Chemical dosing and other associated systems

- Platforms and Technologies: Simatic TIA, Simatic WinCC, S7-300 PLCs, ET-200 based remote I/O, Profibus DP,  Multivendor Instrumentation

projects.title: Sludge Management Extension - Obeikan Paper Industries
projects.description:
Activities and Responsibilities: Involved in all stages of Plant EPC in Electrical and Automation domain, Plant control system Designing - Integration - Commissioning

projects.title: Riyadh Water Supply Program - NWC / Nesma-Wetico JV
projects.description:
- Description: Six month rush project to enhance the water supply to the Riyadh area in anticipation of a possible shortage of city water supply during summers. A $100+ Million project with total capacity of 65000 m3/day water treatment and storage plant at multiple locations in the Saudi central province.

 - Activities and Responsibilities: Involved in most major parts of project execution in electrical and automation domain of work scope - client submittal approvals, detailed electrical design, panel fabrication, materials procurement, plant development and system integration, logic development, SCADA system development and integration - all performed under immense pressure form client to complete project within 6 months deadline
 
- Platforms and Technologies: Simatic STEP-7, Simatic WinCC, S7-300, ET-200 based remote I/O, Fiber optic link module - OLM/G12, Profibus/DP over copper and fiber optic
 
- Water Process: Cooling tower, Self cleaning filters, Ultra-Filtration, Reverse Osmosis, Pumping station, Storage tanks and other associated processes eg. chemical dosing, etc

projects.title: Treadmill device controller - Product development engineering
projects.description:
- Activities and Responsibilities: Assist in system design of device controller for treadmill, system requirement study, features analysis, potential market study (medical and personal health markets), fabrication of testing hardware and procedures, unit testing.
- Platforms and Methods: Delta Automation, Toshiba DC drives, LED Matrix and LCD displays, Modular design approach

projects.title: Temperature Gradient Tunnel (TGT) System - Datalogger and Control software development and System integration
projects.description:
- Development platform: Visual Studio.Net (2007)
- Database: MS Access, MS Excel based report generation
- Hardware Interface: Serial RS-232, PSOC based system controller
- Client: National Research Center for Agroforestry (NRCAF), India

profile_positions.description:
Project management for supply of engineered compressed air packages, with contributions to following key projects:

o Saline Water Conversion Corp. (SWCC), Supply of High-Pressure Air Compressor (API 618) for Surge Vessel application, located in 24 water transmission pumping stations across Saudi Arabia.

o Veolia, Central Utilities and Waste Valorization Plant, Jubail – Compressed Air and Nitrogen generator package

o Arabian Rig Manufacturing (Joint venture of Aramco & NOV), Compressed air package

company.name: Water and Environment Technologies Company - WETICO

profile_positions.company: Water and Environment Technologies Company - WETICO
profile_positions.description:
As project electrical engineer, I had following responsibilities in Water and Waste-water industry, for several large and medium size projects:

- Review technical qualifications and provide budget estimates for upcoming projects
- Project technical approvals, sub-contractor and vendor negotiations
- Manage and lead on-site installation and commissioning team 
- Selection, integration, commissioning and maintenance of multi-vendor Instrumentation and Controllers
- Plant control system design, programming and troubleshooting
- SCADA and HMI development
- Electrical systems integration, installation, testing and commissioning
- Field services, project handover, operations training and customer support

profile_positions.description:

- On Site/Field Services and Support
- Involved in most major aspects of product development from requirements development to risk analysis, system design, implementation, unit testing, integration and verification
